createPayment.name: createPayment
createPayment.summary: Once you have created a payment, you should redirect your customer to the URL in the $payment['_links']['checkout']['href']

createPaymentFirstTime.name: createPaymentFirstTime
createPaymentFirstTime.summary: Create a payment for the first time for the user.
createPaymentFirstTime.description:
Once you have created a payment, you should redirect your customer to the URL in the $payment['_links']['checkout']['href']
   *
This will return the `customerId` and `mandateId` in the response.

description_parts.content: Once you have created a payment, you should redirect your customer to the URL in the $payment['_links']['checkout']['href'] * This will return the customerId and mandateId in the response.

createOnDemandPayment.name: createOnDemandPayment

getMandate.name: getMandate
getMandate.summary: Retrieve a mandate by its ID and its customer’s ID.

listMandates.name: listMandates
listMandates.summary: Retrieve all mandates for the given customerId, ordered from newest to oldest.

revokeMandate.name: revokeMandate
revokeMandate.description:
*
You will no longer be able to charge the consumer’s bank account or credit card
with this mandate and all connected subscriptions will be canceled.
   *
https://docs.mollie.com/reference/v2/mandates-api/revoke-mandate

description_parts.content: You will no longer be able to charge the consumer’s bank account or credit card with this mandate and all connected subscriptions will be canceled. https://docs.mollie.com/reference/v2/mandates-api/revoke-mandate

getCustomer.name: getCustomer
getCustomer.summary: Retrieve a single customer by its ID.

refundPayment.name: refundPayment
refundPayment.summary: Creates a Refund on the Payment. The refunded amount is credited to your customer.

getOrganization.summary: Return the currently authenticated organization object.

getOrganizationId.summary: Return the currently authenticated organization id.

getProfiles.name: getProfiles
getProfiles.summary: Retrieve all profiles available on the account.

enablePaymentMethod.name: enablePaymentMethod
enablePaymentMethod.summary: Enable a payment method on a specific or authenticated profile to use it with payments.

listPayments.name: listPayments
listPayments.summary: Retrieve all payments created ordered from newest to oldest.

description_parts.content: This will list all payments not only the paid ones so when looping through results you can check if a payment is paid: *

arguments.name: params
arguments.description: Used for pagination. Offset the result set to the payment with this ID. The payment with this ID is included in the result set as well.

arguments.name: from
arguments.description: The number of payments to return (with a maximum of 250).

getPayment.name: getPayment
getPayment.summary: Retrieve a single payment object by it's id.

listMainAccountPayments.summary: Retrieve all main account payments created ordered from newest to oldest.

description_parts.content: This will list all payments not only the paid ones so when looping through results you can check if a payment is paid: *

arguments.name: params
arguments.description: Used for pagination. Offset the result set to the payment with this ID. The payment with this ID is included in the result set as well.

arguments.name: from
